thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com
thread.title: Ije Okpokwasili

author: Ije Okpokwasili
title: Ije Okpokwasili
text: Mobile online checkout is glitchy, asking to use card in file, saying address saved needs to be verified/corrected (when it doesn't), pulling up the address less 1 digit in the zip code, then making me enter all my card info from scratch. Very annoying. There should be a paypal option as well. Other than that, I love Fabletics clothing. They prices are great and the quality is extraordinary.
